languages.text: {n}Инфернус ухмыляется.{/n} "Кажется, вы нашли чью-то заначку. Что там было? Плесневелый пищбрикет, лхо, горстка тронов? Рабочие часто прячут свои пожитки или запрещенку, чтобы блюстители не отобрали или вороватые соседи не поживились. Возможно, кто-то пометил тайник знаком, чтобы его потом было проще найти?"

{n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернус ухмыляется.{/n} "Кажется, вы нашли чью-то заначку. Что там было? Плесневелый пищбрикет, лхо, горстка тронов? languages.text: {n}Einrich se ríe.{/n} «Creo que ha encontrado el alijo secreto de alguien. ¿Qué había? ¿Una barrita de nutrientes mohosa, lho y unos tronos? Los trabajadores suelen ocultar sus pertenencias y objetos prohibidos a ojos de los guardias y los vecinos codiciosos. ¿No habrá marcado alguien su alijo para poder encontrarlo luego?».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich se ríe.{/n} «Creo que ha encontrado el alijo secreto de alguien. ¿Qué había? ¿Una barrita de nutrientes mohosa, lho y unos tronos? Los trabajadores suelen ocultar sus pertenencias y objetos prohibidos a ojos de los guardias y los vecinos codiciosos. ¿No habrá marcado alguien su alijo para poder encontrarlo luego?».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは苦笑する。{/n}「誰かの秘密の隠し場所を見つけたようですね。何がありましたか？カビの生えた栄養剤やルホ、数台の王座でしょうか？労働者はたまに、エンフォーサーや欲しがりの隣人から、所持品だとか禁止品だとかを隠します。後で見つけやすくするために、誰かが隠し場所にシンボルの印をつけたのかもしれませんね」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}男は苦笑する。{/n}「誰かの秘密の隠し場所を見つけたようですね。何がありましたか？カビの生えた栄養剤やアイホ、数台の王座でしょうか？労働者はたまに、エンフォーサーや欲しがりの隣人から、所持品だとか禁止品だとかを隠します。後で見つけやすくするために、誰かが隠し場所にシンボルの印をつけたのかもしれませんね」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇笑了起来。{/n}“您应该是发现了某个船员的秘密藏匿处，里面藏了什么？是发了霉的营养条？几根麻烟？还是几枚王座币？工人经常会把自己的财物或违禁品藏起来，不让执法者或贪婪的邻人看到。说不定某个人用这个记号来标记藏匿的地方，以便以后更容易找到？”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇笑了起来。{/n}“您应该是发现了某个船员的秘密藏匿处，里面藏了什么？是发了霉的营养条？几根麻烟？还是几枚王座币？工人经常会把自己的财物或违禁品藏起来，不让执法者或贪婪的邻人看到。说不定某个人用这个记号来标记藏匿的地方，以便以后更容易找到？”

languages.text: {n}Einrich lacht.{/n} "Da habt Ihr wohl jemandes Geheimversteck entdeckt. Was war es? Ein ranziger Nutririegel? Lho? Ein paar Thronmünzen? Arbeiter verstecken ihren Besitz oder verbotene Dinge oft vor den Enforcern oder gierigen Nachbarn. Vielleicht hat jemand sein Versteck mit dem Symbol markiert, um es leichter wiederzufinden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich lacht.{/n} "Da habt Ihr wohl jemandes Geheimversteck entdeckt. Was war es? Ein ranziger Nutririegel? Lho? Ein paar Thronmünzen? Arbeiter verstecken ihren Besitz oder verbotene Dinge oft vor den Enforcern oder gierigen Nachbarn. Vielleicht hat jemand sein Versteck mit dem Symbol markiert, um es leichter wiederzufinden?"

languages.text: {n}Einrich rit.{/n} « On dirait que vous êtes {mf|tombé|tombée} sur la planque d'un membre de l'équipage. Qu'y avait-il à l'intérieur ? Une nutribarre moisie, du lho et une poignée de trônes ? Les ouvriers cachent souvent leurs maigres possessions et objets interdits à l'abri des convoitises et du regard inquisiteur des prévôts. Son propriétaire a peut-être gravé ce symbole de manière à les retrouver plus facilement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich rit.{/n} « On dirait que vous êtes {mf|tombé|tombée} sur la planque d'un membre de l'équipage. Qu'y avait-il à l'intérieur ? Une nutribarre moisie, du lho et une poignée de trônes ? Les ouvriers cachent souvent leurs maigres possessions et objets interdits à l'abri des convoitises et du regard inquisiteur des prévôts. Son propriétaire a peut-être gravé ce symbole de manière à les retrouver plus facilement. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Sanırım birilerinin gizli zulasını bulmuşsunuz. İçinde ne vardı? Küf tutmuş bir besinbar, liho dalı, üç beş sikke filan mı? İşçiler, eşyalarını ya da yasaklı içerikleri infazcılardan ve tamahkâr komşularından sık sık saklar. Belki birileri, sonradan bulması daha kolay olsun diye zulasını bu sembolle işaretlemiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich chuckles.{/n} "I think you've found someone's secret stash. What was it? A mouldy nutribar, lho, a few thrones? Workers often hide their belongings or banned items from the enforcers or covetous neighbours. Maybe someone marked their cache with the symbol to make it easier to find later?"
